Container:
whoami
Tiny Go webserver that prints OS information and HTTP request to output. NOTE: This image has no termial. It's extremely simple. Info on http commands you can pass are located on the project page. https://github.com/traefik/whoami
https://hub.docker.com/r/traefik traefik/whoami https://github.com/FirbyKirby/unraid-docker-templates/issues https://github.com/FirbyKirby/unraid-docker-templates/ https://github.com/FirbyKirby/unraid-docker-templates/icons/whoami.png Network:Proxy Network:Web
false bridge http://[IP]:[PORT:80]
<Config Type="Port" Name="Webserver Port" Target="80" Default="2001" Mode="tcp" Description="This is the webserver port. It is the only interface into the container." Display="always" Required="true"
